name: Weng Santos
text: Roy Tang , 09175299073 pag natokhang ka G.    I'm still optimistic about the law.  I believe that in its plain words there is justice.  And your right to due process, that is in the plain words of no less than the Constitution.

source_obj.text: Roy Tang , 09175299073 pag natokhang ka G.    I'm still optimistic about the law.  I believe that in its plain words there is justice.  And your right to due process, that is in the plain words of no less than the Constitution.
